sentences.en: All devout Jews who could manage it tried to be there at Passover.
sentences.cn: 所有虔诚的犹太人都想方设法在逾越节到达那里.

sentences.en: Although he seems to be an old-fashioned non-conformist, he is in fact a very devout Catholic.
sentences.cn: 虽然他看起来像守旧的新教徒，实际是非常虔诚的天主教徒。

sentences.en: Both my parents were devout Anglicans.
sentences.cn: 我的父母都是虔诚的圣公会教徒。

sentences.en: His devout Catholicism appeals to ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 他对天主教的虔诚信仰感染了普通民众。

sentences.en: My mother, I think, was devout.
sentences.cn: 我母亲呢, 我认为她是笃信宗教的.

sentences.en: Philip, his restless mind avid for new things, became very devout.
sentences.cn: 菲利浦思想活跃,对新事物如饥如渴, 变得笃信虔城了.

sentences.en: She freely admitted that many devout ministers and professors in times past had enjoyed downright revelation.
sentences.cn: 她完全承认在过去的时代有许多虔诚的牧师和信徒曾受到上天的启示.

sentences.en: She is a devout Roman Catholic.
She never forgets to say her prayers; she is a devout girl.
sentences.cn: 她是个虔诚的女孩,从来不忘做祷告.

sentences.en: She used to be a devout catholic.
sentences.cn: 她曾是个虔诚的天主教徒。

sentences.en: She was a sincerely devout girl.
sentences.cn: 她是个真挚虔诚的姑娘.

sentences.en: Some of the more devout boys thought it was a little strong.
sentences.cn: 有几个比较认真的同学嫌太深奥了点儿.
那位虔诚的男士每天都祈祷.

sentences.en: You can't ask a devout people to disregard a precious teaching.
sentences.cn: 你无法让那些虔诚的信徒不遵守那些珍贵的教义.

trans.tran_cn: 虔诚的，真诚的，诚恳的，献身于宗教的
trans.tran_en: someone who is devout has a very strong belief in a religion
